alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued February 23 at 7:57AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH 11 AM SST... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from continuous rainfall WHERE...Tutuila, Aunu`u and Manu`a Islands WHEN...Through 11 AM SST IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Satellite imagery show more rainfall streaming across the territory over the next few hours that will maintain conditions for flooding roadways and low lying areas. Especially as grounds are saturated from days of rainfall. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 800 TAEAO ASO LULU FEPUARI 23 2022 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 11 AM SST... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai le tetele o timuga. NOFOAGA...Tutuila, Aunu`u ma Manu`a TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 11 AM SST AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono tutupu sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le palapala ua iai nei. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O loo vaaia pea i satelite le tetele o timuga o loo aga`i mai i luga o le atunu`u e ono faatupulaia ai tafega ma lologa. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
